website_summaries.verdict: This heats up in seconds to give long-lasting curls and includes extra accessories such as a burn-resistant glove and hair clips.
pros: It includes an adjustable temperature setting, not just high and low, to produce perfectly sized curls that are shiny and not fried
cons: This appliance isn't good for all hair types, and the handle is so long it can make storage inconvenient

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron ever
customer_reviews.text: I wait a month before I wrote a review to see how I like this iron. I got to tell you, I never DIDN'T like it. From the first time I used it till today its amazed me. The curls come out wonderful. I like to curl mine and run my fingers through; see pic. The barrel is super long which I love, I have longer hair. The coating is slick and your curls come out and move effortlessly from the iron. The tip gets pretty warm, but its never burned me, or been a problem, I don't need to be near it to do my hair. Its the best I have ever had in my life. Will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: topbook

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron I’ve tried yet!
customer_reviews.text: I’m that person that always reads reviews but never writes one, this one truly warrants one. This curling iron is perfect for long hair! My curls last all day (the picture are after a 12 hr shift), it doesn’t burn your hair, heats up quickly, and it’s definitely great quality. You cannot get any better quality for this price. It has a warranty, comes with gloves and hair clips too. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca panko

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron gets hot and stays hot. It has temperature controls and a digital display, which is way better that the typical "high medium low" options. The only thing I would add to it is maybe a temp lock option since I often find myself bumping the down button mid curl. Otherwise, this product is great. The length is perfect for my long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: BUY. THIS. CURLING. IRON. My hair is fine, but there is a LOT of it, and it has never held a curl. Ever. Usually I curl it and the curls fall out within an hour and I’m left with frizzy mop head, no matter what products I’ve used. As soon as I finished my first curl, I was like, omg, this works! Not only does it give you super pretty curls, they hold for days! (Or at least until you wash your hair. Whatever comes first. Haha). Love this thing! The temperature setting is very helpful too!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki W

customer_reviews.title: Great Curling Iron.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I use it on my hard to hold curl hair. I use the heat at 350 and hold the curl for 10 seconds. Literally! It holds curl all day and well into the next. Tip gets hot but you can use the glove. I love it and the barrel length is great for my long hair. I can do my whole head in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: laura l

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my thin straight hair
customer_reviews.text: This gives my hair the bit of fluff it needs. I thought I purchases a one inch but this 1.25 inch is even better. It's easy to handle, has a long cord, heats up fast and cools down fast. All this plus the adjustable temperature make it my favorite iron thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jzoom

customer_reviews.title: Temperature issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife in mid February of 2018 and 40 days later this product doesn’t work. (shocking how it felt just beyond the return date) Still maintains power, however when you hit the plus button to increase the temperature, the curling iron stays at 35° and does not increase or decrease. I am an electrician, and I disassembled the product to see if there was any wiring issue, and there is not. It seems to be some kind of control board issue with this item. It is possible that I purchased a defective curly iron, however now I am jaded and would advise against purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A Cook

customer_reviews.title: Need to use a glove while curling to avoid burns!
customer_reviews.text: While this heats up quickly and curls well, it’s designed in a way where you have to wear the glove or you will burn your hand because the plastic tip is so narrow. I dont want to use a glove every time so i ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M.

customer_reviews.title: It just doesnt curl hair.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed and am wondering if some of these reviews are fake. Its big, lovely...sure, and simply does not curl hair. The curls do not hold. I am certain you can find a product that doies a better job of curling your hair at any department store. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday curling iron
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to every day curling iron and it works like a charm! It can get pretty hot but it has a temperature control. It heats up quickly and it gives me great curls which lasts throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: MerrY RevieWer

customer_reviews.title: End does not stay cool to the touch!  Would return if I could.
customer_reviews.text: The curling iron works fine, but the black end gets too hot to hold. That's ridiculous. I've had drugstore curling irons that you could hold the ends on and they would not be hot. I would return if I could. Update. I was contacted by customer service and they are sending me a refund and are working to fix the problem. I did not expect that and appreciate their attentive customer service. Thanks Carol!
customer_reviews.author: ibJ9

customer_reviews.title: this curling iron is beautiful and both the handle and barrel are longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this curling iron is beautiful and both the handle and barrel are longer than my now-retired iron. The 1.25 inch is the perfect size for big beachy curls, the iron heats up super quick, and I love that it shuts off automatically after 30 minutes as I am always paranoid whether or not I remembered to unplug everything when I leave the house. I have only used this iron once so far but I was able to style my hair quickly and the curls looked great, even the next morning when I woke up. Winner! I hope this product lasts for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: sbiel

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great at First...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this curling iron, but within a few short months, the thumb clamp began sticking and the release would not close to curl my hair. I have to flip it under the clamp to close it which is pretty annoying every time you go to curl a few strands. If enough hair is not clamped, the release won't stay closed. Trashing this one and buying a different brand. Wish my outcome had been a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to reach for this iron for looser curls
customer_reviews.text: Seller reached out to me and sent me a replacement since my original purchase didn’t seem to hold its heat thus I couldn’t hold a curl. The replacement 1.5” barrel worked much more effectively. I enjoyed the longer barrel and it curled my hair much more consistently. Will definitely use it more. The handle seemed lighter or different quality than my 1.25” I originally received but it may come in handy for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a great curling iron
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron gets VERY hot so be very careful. I accidentally dropped it once when I was using it and it burned my neck very badly very quickly. It was only on my neck for a second on the way down in the fall from my head to the ground. But that moment was enough to cause a burn that is taking weeks to heal. Otherwise, a great curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: MensaMom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than two years
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this less than two years ago. She liked it a good bit, I guess it did all the hair things it is supposed to do. However, the spring under the handle that creates the tension to make it work broke about a week ago. It was dropped or used roughly, she just squeezed the handle one day, and the coil in the spring snapped in half. We couldn't find any replacement parts. Everything else works fine, but we will have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: J.K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Loving this curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this curling iron. I have been using it for 2 weeks and so far so good. I love the long cord and adjustable heat settings. I have medium length fine hair, but a lot of it. This does the job. I was a little skeptical of the longer length of this curling iron because I wasn’t sure I could use this without burning myself but I was pleasantly surprised. I really like the longer length. It isn’t cumbersome at all. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Corps Mama

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast fast fast!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new curling iron. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and use it daily. None of my hair products stick to the iron and give it that yucky brown stain that my CHI iron gets and my hair still looks as good as it did after my haircut a few weeks back. I was amazed how quickly this iron heated up the first time and every time since and I use the hottest setting in ten second increments. I will definitely be buying this again but as a Christmas present for my best friend later this year.
customer_reviews.author: RitaRude

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased T3 last September, four times the price of this one...and T3 is not working (terrible brand!) and this is great! I love that I can control the temperature, the design and colour is elegant. I also love the glove it comes with, I’m more relaxed when I’m wearing it, hate to burn my hand Update: I’m exchanging it for their Wand. The waves I want won’t happen with a curling iron, only the wand. I’m purchasing from Anjou though just because I like the curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Big curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly, has a nice long barrel. It took me a while to figure out that I needed to hold the power button down for several seconds to get the iron to turn on. I'm giving it 4 stars because I find the placement of all the buttons inconvenient. I keep accidentally pressing them while using the iron.
customer_reviews.author: cyclecat

customer_reviews.title: This curling iron is great. I have used Hot Tools and didn't think ...
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is great. I have used Hot Tools and didn't think I would like another curling iron as much, but I do! I wanted one with automatic shutoff, but I am very happy with the length of the barrel, how fast it heats up, the hair clips that are included and the curl that I get. I gave it 4 stars because the stand does not work, my curling iron will not sit on the stand and it ends up collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Naruu

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was too long/bulky and actually was going to return it. But then I waited to long and am glad I didn’t! Love the auto shut off since I’m usually down the road worrying about if I left it on. And now that I have the hang of it, I can curl my hair super fast. The curl lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell, doesn’t hold
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try something other than con air. This curler is NOT the way to go. It makes hair smell awful (lingers for days, even after you wash it) - even if you use it on a lower heat. Even worse, it holds a curl less than Conair so my hair falls after an hour. Save your money, do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: ThisMagicMoment

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had for a few days, but it does go up to 410 degrees, came nicely boxed, and seems to be heavy-duty. Many similar curlng irons with the same descriptions were much more expensive. It has an auto shut-off. The on/off takes a minute to figure out. You have to hold down the button for a while till it turns on, then you can push the temp up or down. There are three separate buttons for operation. So far, it seems worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne S.

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love it, but after using it a few times ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it, but after using it a few times it just doesn't work the way it's supposed to. The curls won't stay, they just fall even using flexible hairspray and the hottest setting it has. I have naturally curly hair and I have always just curled it from curly with other irons with no issue, sometimes I blow dry straight-ish and then curl. I don't understand why the curls just fall and then it doesn't look like I even curled it. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: G. Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent curling iron
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent curling iron. I purchased for a trip to Europe because it can work with 110 or 220 V. It worked perfectly on my trip (with an adapter attached) and I liked it so much that I retired my previous Hot Tools curling iron in favor of this one. It heats up really quickly and also cools down quickly which is nice when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: NJPerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The curling iron works great...now that I know how to turn it on! This very essential step, advised in a later email is missing from the instruction manual: " Please press the power button for 2 seconds to turn on the iron." I returned the 1st iron I purchased thinking that it was defective because there was no power! This action doesn't seem to work in reverse, however. The only way I can tell to turn it off is to unplug it. Otherwise, no issues or complaints! Heats up quickly and cools down nicely, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kris K.

customer_reviews.title: It works with short hair or long.
customer_reviews.text: My previous curling iron was slowly dying. I bought this and I LOVE IT. I have short hair but it does a good job anyway.....I read the reviews before I bought it and now I share what everyone else says. It's a GREAT curling iron!!! I'm happy I bought it!!! I love the way I can choose the temperature on this curling iron. I've never had such a wonderful curling iron...This one is superb!
customer_reviews.author: MaineCoons4me

customer_reviews.title: Good iron but the insulated tip is WAY too hot to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice curling iron. It's longer than your regular curling iron and your hair slides through the clamp without tearing which is nice. I'm docking it stars though because the "anti-scalding insulated tip" is false advertising. On my other lesser expensive curling irons, you can actually hold the black plastic tip for leverage as you're curling. This curling iron tip is way too hot to hold. It's not as hot as the metal part that's 400+ degrees, but you will burn your fingers if you hold it for longer than a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: LeahC

customer_reviews.title: Comes with glove and clips!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling iron. In the process of growing from very short to medium length hair, I needed a larger barreled curling iron. This one is sleek, and comfortable to hold. it arrived with two hair clips and a protective glove to ensure no burns on my hand. It heats up quickly and leaves a shiny curl in my fine, straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: EmElDee4

customer_reviews.title: Best. One. Yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite curling iron EVER. The barrel is so long it can accommodate medium/long hair easily. It has an auto shutoff (a must for me since I am forgetful) and a really long cord. It gets hot really quickly and the temperature is easy to control. I cannot recommend this iron enough.
customer_reviews.author: femme246

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use then the iron's without the clip. Also gets very hot if you desire. It gives medium size long curls. I just hold the very tip out to give the appearance that I'm using a flat iron.. Comes out great.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for its price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for its price. I like the glove that came with the curling iron as I burn my fingers occasionally when I am curling my hair. The curling iron heats up quickly and makes beautiful curls. I am very satisfied and would recommend this products to my family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kate. N

customer_reviews.title: Speaking form 2nd hand experience but...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has had a ton of trouble finding a good curling iron that didn't break the bank, and went through quite a few until one of her friends recommended this one. She seems to like it a lot so I'm passing on the good review! I do recall her saying it wasn't curling well the last time we used it, but I also know we were in a bit of a time crunch, so not docking off points as her opinion of it didn't change.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Y Shen

customer_reviews.title: Not dual voltage!!  Poor product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travel to Ireland. Made a frying/sizzling noise from the very first time I plugged it in. I was only using an outlet adapter since it is, supposedly, dual voltage. I quickly plugged it into a converter, but the sizzling noise continued and the handle became very hot! So hot it started to melt! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought me this curling iron I love it. It heats up really fast
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this curling iron I love it. It heats up really fast. It also has an extra long barrel which is great for my long hair. It also came with two hair clips and a heat proof glove. I've been using Hot Tools for the past few years, they just don't last. So far this works so much better than the Hot Tools curling irons. You do have to hold down the power button for a few seconds before it turns on. Which is now a feature I appreciate, nothing can bump into it and turn it on or adjust the heat. This is a great curling iron!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice curling iron.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my favorite curling iron that broke and so far it's worked well. I did have an issue with the cord and the seller was able to Help me fix the issue right away. I am very happy with my purchase and my hair looks great
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kazaras

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Heats up to 410 degrees in about a minute. The tourmaline ceramic has been gentle on my hair especially the ends. Cord is about 6ft, so plenty of length to move around. Over a year later and it's still like new. I have the Anjou flat iron in the same coating and it is great too.
customer_reviews.author: lkizer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it if you don’t want your hand to get burned
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible, it almost burned my hand. The black part that your hand suppose to hold on while you do the curling, it turned into very hot, i couldn’t hold it at all and of course couldn’t get my hair done. I bought it to go on a vacation and I ended up having my hair messy because this iron didn’t work at all. Really disappointed, it’s not a cheap curling iron but the quality is terrible
customer_reviews.author: J. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Worked in some places, but not in others
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to Iceland since it is dual voltage. Sometimes it worked, but in a few of the airbnb's that I stayed in, the curling iron wouldn't stay on, so I was unable to use it. A friend borrowed this for her trip to Italy, and she said it worked just fine. So I guess it is hit or miss!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Frary

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like that it heats up quickly, I can adjust the heat through a wide range of settings and that the degrees are displayed. I have wavy fine hair and the smooth, shiny curls last into the second day using the 280 degree setting. It has a longer than average cord, which is nice. I bought this primarily because it has dual voltage and want to use it on an upcoming trip to France. The only thing I would change about this curling iron would be its length. It is quite a bit longer than most.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling iron! Love the digital temperature reading , you know exactly what temp it is, love the longer barrel , can easily manipulate my curls specifically how I want them , super easy with a longer barrel ! Heats up super quick , I even love the color ! Pink is my favorite color ! Yes I am a grown woman , but pink is still my fav! A girlie girl at heart ❤️ and while a rose gold colored barrel on my curling iron is not a necessity, it does make me smile . So great features and great price ! So five stars ✨
customer_reviews.author: sandra m

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, medium length hair and was looking for a long barrel iron. This one looked perfect. I've used (or tried to use) it about 3 times. First of all, the spring clamp does not hold the hair tight and it slips out. Second, it doesn't curl my hair. I've tried all heat settings and don't get much of a curl and if I do, it doesn't last. Third, I agree with other reviews, you have to be very careful with the tip as it gets too hot and will burn your finger tips. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creates beautiful, bouncy curls!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this curling iron for my hair extensions. It doesn’t curl my fine, natural hair all that well but I expected that. You might need a smaller barrel if you have very fine, short hair. Otherwise, works great and holds curl all day! Plus the rose gold barrel is so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Laila E.

customer_reviews.title: As Good As NuMe Wands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try a new curling technique that requires a clip (versus a wand-type curling iron), and this curls as quickly and as well as my NuMe wand. It heats up very quickly and retains heat well - I have thick, hard to curl hair, and this makes my hair hold a curl without any product. This makes Hot Tools look overpriced. I loved the 1.25 inch so much, I'm buying a 1.5 inch as well. The rose gold color is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Saeiouy

customer_reviews.title: Curls for Days
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a keratin blow out to get rid of frizz and I wanted to add some curl to change it up on occasion. I purchased this curling iron because the reviews were great and I have not been disappointed. It heats up quickly and my hair stays curled for days. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even curl but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have medium-thick naturally straight hair and this product did not do its job. My hair curled for one minute and became straight again. Had to go back to my wand as it is the only thing that curls my hair correctly. Amazon needs to work on their quality control as most of their products are made out of cheap and unreliable material. Update: The brand reached out to me and was able to refund for the iron and they even sent me a gift. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stops heating while you're in the middle of doing your hair.
customer_reviews.author: LaBoss

customer_reviews.title: Great Curling Iron!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling iron. I was using hottools brand for years but their quality has gone down hill. This curling iron has a lob barrel which is so nice for my long hair! Love that it comes with a heat protecting glove that I wear while curling my hair. The only thing that bothers me a little bit is that it has a built in shut off timer. First time using it I plugged it in and starting doing my makeup and when it was time to do my hair it had shut off so I had to wait for it to hear back up (which wasn’t long so that was good) awesome product all in all tho :)!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Used it for the first time today --- not fond of it at all
customer_reviews.text: The end gets very hot and it shouldn't. Need the glove and I don't want to have to wear a glove. I'm careful about not putting my hand or fingers on the barrel of the curling iron, but the end should stay cool to the touch. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a really good price
customer_reviews.text: Like the material of the barrel and clip. No residue or stickiness. Have used for quite sometime and it is holding up very well. Temperature can get hot if you need it too. When this one finally "quits", I will buy another one. I don't suspect that will be for a while. This is the best I have every bought, and I have owned 10-12 curling irons at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curls don't last
customer_reviews.text: Does curl my hair initially and they look great too, but even with hairspray my curls fall within the hour. I get better results curling with my straightener. I would think it is just my hair but I have had it curled and stayed all night many other times so it must be the curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Catieg

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect it to be that perfect. It makes perfect curls that lasts for hours. Note: Have been using it for almost more than a year now and it is still working like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Barrel is too long
customer_reviews.text: The curling iron itself is great, but the barrel is WAY TOO LONG. It’s incredibly awkward to use. I’ve burned myself three times because it’s so long, and I’m pretty experienced with curling irons. I have the 1” barrel from the same brand and it’s perfect. Not sure why they felt the need to extend the barrel length on the 1.25”
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L. Stubrud

customer_reviews.title: High heat, quickly heats, extras
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast, comes with clips and a glove to protect your hand from the heat, you can’t beat the price. My only misfortune is that I got the 1.25 inch which creates wider curls than the beachy waves look I was going for so make sure you understand that each diameter will do to your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this curling iron. It gets really hot which allows me to curl my hair for just a few seconds and its set and ready to go. This has sped up the amount of time it takes to do my hair significantly. Love it and thrilled with this purchase, only wish I had purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: My curls didn't last
customer_reviews.text: The curler itself is fine; heated up quickly and made beautiful curls but I was really hoping for a special iron that would somehow make the curls last. Sadly, it wasn't this iron. Curls lasted maybe 45 minutes in my long, fine, naturally-straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Hot stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great curling iron. Well made and gets hot super fast. The only thing is, you have to hold the on switch for three seconds to turn it on. When I first got it I thought it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Green

customer_reviews.title: but it's better for the health of your hair anyway
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a curl very well, but it's better for the health of your hair anyway. When i'm trying to curl the back of my hair, I have to be really careful not to graze my neck because it's a very long curling iron. It has a nice long cord with a velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: The 3-second rule still didn't make this work
customer_reviews.text: After less than five uses, it stopped working. I suspect seller knows it's a problem because they actually sent an email tell consumers to press the button down for at least 3 seconds. Still doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: black ink + paper

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this so far. Long barrel which is good for my long hair. Heats up wicked fast. Came with a cute glove and 2 hair clips. the handle isn't slippery at all. Curls great, I adjust the temperature to 270 bc I have thin hair and don't need a lot of heat. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: i am very happy with this curling iron
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hot Tools for the past several years and have had to replace it three times when the same part breaks from wear. I decided I was ready for a change. i am very happy with this curling iron. As promised, it heats up fast and is longer than the standard product which is great for medium to long hair. The three heat settings are great for extra flexibility in how I use it to achieve curl. I love the extra goodies that it comes with as well! Give it a try- I think you'll be satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best curling iron I have ever owned!!! I am a loyal wand user because that was the only tool that would curl my hair, until I gave this one a try and it is fantastic!! It curls so dang fast! I have thick hair and can do my whole head in about 8 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Rickson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Drop it once and forget about it ever working again.
customer_reviews.text: Just received a replancement curling iron. Hopefully, it will last longer than the first one. It heats up quickly and is easy to use. As I have only used it twice, I am reluctant to give it more stars than it deserves, especially because my last one broke so quickly. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jarosz

customer_reviews.title: Keep getting burned
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because it’s too long and there’s not enough protection for the hands around the handle, I keep getting burned! besides that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: ... had this iron for over a month and I love it. I love how long the handle is
customer_reviews.text: I have had this iron for over a month and I love it. I love how long the handle is, so it makes it a lot easier to hold and maneuver. The curls turn out amazing, always get compliments on my hair every time I use it. Get it you won't regret it. Also helps to watch youtube video on how to us it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice but love it so far with one exception. I only gave it 4 stars because of lack of memory when you turn it on and have to reset to your desired setting. The low price probably accounts for that. But I really love the fact that you can see what the temperature is right on the dial. Huge factor for me because I have bleached hair and want to make sure I'm not over heating and destroying it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is not only pretty but does a great job of setting my fine and thin hair with no damage. Although my hair is short, this curling iron has a long wand which would be perfect for curling long hair.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Silly button placement
customer_reviews.text: This iron works well, however your hand is on the buttons the whole time you use it. I keep turning down the heat setting and even turned it off about 5 times within 10 minutes. Not good placement for the buttons at all. Pain in the neck to use!
customer_reviews.author: ChristineD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this curler! It heats up SUPER FAST, and I like the way that my hair looks when I use it! My only complaint is that I've been using it for a few months and theres a spot in the middle of the temp display area that won't go away, but I use a pretty low setting so I don't rely much on the display anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Ahern

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I don't love about this curling iron. Best iron I've had in a long long time! And the barrel is extra long. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R & R

customer_reviews.title: Throw out your old curling iron.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hairstylist. Looked for an easy to use iron for loose curls. I tried the flat iron that my hairstylist uses... that was a disaster- nothing but kinks and bent hair. I Love this curling iron. I haven't curled my own hair in years. It heats in a flash and curls in a flash. Took me maybe 10 minutes... next time it will take 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling iron. It heats up quickly and evenly. It holds my very fine, slippery hair very well and gives me great, lasting curls. I like the shape of the tip, too. It's just about impossible to burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Pameladeville

customer_reviews.title: Good curling iron.
customer_reviews.text: It came with a glove...thank heavens...I’m a klutz with a curling iron. I like the temperature control& the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: dolores3b

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of curling irons in my life. Nothing compares to this one. I love the longer barrel, it is great for my long hair. Heats to 410 degrees. I will be buying my daughter one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sutton

customer_reviews.title: It's extra long!
customer_reviews.text: Great for longer hair, heats up very fast. Works well for my hair extensions. Doesn't damage hair. It's REALLY long with a long cord, almost commercial hair salon like.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair curler!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new hair curler. I can use it as a curler or as a wand which gives a different look to my hair. However, I did also order the 1.5 to compare and see which size I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Daydreamer

customer_reviews.title: 5 dyats
customer_reviews.text: No need to spend a lot of money on a fancy curling iron . Believe me I have In the past. This one is just as good I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: treevnp

customer_reviews.title: Skip it buy conair tourmaline one or hot tools tourmaline one
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron description makes it seem like it’s high quality when it’s really not I had it at the highest setting and it was damaging it because it’s not a tourmaline iron and the curl wouldn’t stay after 1 minute for 23$ skip it the conair one is 20$ with tourmaline and it works if u have the money 50$ go for the hot tools one they are both popular
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not better than my purple hot tools
customer_reviews.text: It's ok! Definitely not better than my purple hot tools. It kind of pulls of my hair and i hate that and also the hair doesnt stay curled for long, the curls fell in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: karmen haik

customer_reviews.title: fine hair. The 1
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to find a curling iron/wand that will actually keep a curl in my straight, fine hair. The 1.25 in barrel creates a really nice wave in my long hair, and the long barrel is really helpful in wrapping the hair around without burning myself.
customer_reviews.author: Shep Fargenstein

customer_reviews.title: Huge and bulky
customer_reviews.text: The length of the full curling iron is like from my elbow to my fingers. A bit on the heavy side too. I cannot operate this well without burning myself as it falls or slips continuously. Wanted to love it, but going back.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1209

customer_reviews.title: Clip isn't tight enough
customer_reviews.text: It's fine but the space between the clip and the barrel is too wide to really hold a tight grip. It's a matter of millimeters but those millimeters make the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Notkin

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It's a curling iron, nothing really too special about it. It did the job just fine :)
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Beware It will desemble on its own
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this curling iron did not hold up. I was shocked to pull it out of my draw and found that the area where the electric cord is attached to the handle was completely missing. I had just used it that morning. I have never had a curling iron fall apart as this one has. I believe the materials that were used to construct this hair tool were of cheap quality. I guess you get what you pay for . On a brighter note it did do the job for the year and a have i sparingly used it. Back to buying the expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: I didn't return this item, but my last curling ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't return this item, but my last curling iron was able to get my ends smoother. I think that the this sticky surface grabs my hair too much compared with my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Karalita

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Wand is smooth and the length of the barrel is perfect for my long hair. The spring is not too tight so that it pulls on my hair as I slide through to make the curl. I also like being able to adjust the temperature so I don't further damage my color treated hair. Heated quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bookfan66

customer_reviews.title: Great for amatures
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting to learn to curl my hair and find thisvery easy to use. Heats up super fast and fits well in my hands. Add a little finishing spray (I have very fine hair) and my curls and waves last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new curling iron. The long handle makes it very easy to use. My hair looks & feels great after using this curling iron and the curls stay! Btw, the price on Amazon is amazing low.
customer_reviews.author: PCWP

customer_reviews.title: Great product - recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling iron. I did a lot of research on different irons before making this purchase and I am so happy with it. It is easy to use, my hair doesn't get stuck on the clip, it heats up quickly, and for those that say the power button is in a bad spot, I have not had any problems with it. The barrel is smooth and my hair just slides right off when I let it loose. I definately recommend it and am thinking about getting a different size in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my hair
customer_reviews.text: The curling iron has a high setting of 410° however my hair didn't hold a curl. The iron is well made; I had no issues with that aspect. The company was extremely professional and understanding with my issues and rectified them quickly. I gave them 5 starts due to their professionalism and the product was well made.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: My favorite curler!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this curler for YEARS. It creates the most effortless looking beachy waves! My absolute favorite! Hasn’t died on me either :) I don’t use the glove at all.
customer_reviews.author: alee moy

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad but works good.
customer_reviews.text: Smelled horrible but they gave me a gift to make things better!
customer_reviews.author: Shellymoore22

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really work on my hair, but my hair is thin and very fine. But I think it's a good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best curling iron I've ever used! My hair is long, and naturally wavy. I love the length of the barrel, and it gave me absolutely beautiful, healthy looking curls. My hair is my pride, and I always take great care of it, and this is a gem in my hair care collection. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: K. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't turn on right away, I needed to press the on button a few times. Also the handle is so smooth there is literally zero grip and It is so easy to burn yourself! It slips all over
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best curling iron I have had
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best curling iron I have had. The cord is thick on it and that is why I had to buy a new one cause my cord was coming off and I was scared of a fire or shock.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mcintire

customer_reviews.title: Received curling iron yesterday, attempted to use it this ...
customer_reviews.text: Received curling iron yesterday, attempted to use it this morning, would not turn on (just as other reviews have mentioned). Returning. UPDATE: I received an email from the company, who advised that I should hold and press the power button for at least 3 seconds. This solved the problem! The real problem was that I'm admittedly technically challenged! :) The company's quick response and offer to ship another free of charge was greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Neber

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those big loose curls. Heats up fast, doesn't snag or pull hair, and results in perfect barrel curls!
customer_reviews.author: Shireen

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this curling iron. I am getting beautiful smooth, frizz free curls that last all day and it's not damaging my hair. I can't believe how inexpensive this miracle worker was.
customer_reviews.author: Portia A. Forman

product_meta.title: Anjou Curling Iron 1.25 inch with Tourmaline Ceramic Coating, Hair Curling Wand with Anti-scalding Insulated Tip, Hair Salon Curler Waver Maker (200 °F to 410 °F - For All Types of Hair)
product_meta.description: The Anjou Choice All Anjou products come with a 12-month warrant and exquisite after-sale support team to make sure you're fully satisfied with your purchase.
feature_bullets: FOR ALL HAIRSTYLES & TYPES: Benefit from a finely-proportionate build that measures 8.27 in in length and 1.25 in in width to suit long hair
FAST HEATING PTC & CERAMIC COATING: Heats up to 410 ℉ in only 60 seconds for fast curling; Ceramic construction allows for a smooth operation without pulling the hair
EASY TO USE & CURL: 360 Degree rotatable power cord stretches up to 2.5 m - 40% longer than similar devices; Built-in stainless steel support lets you easily lay the curling wand to cool down
SAFE BUILD & OPERATION: Avoid scalding with the thermally insulated wand tip and included heat resistant glove; Turns automatically off after 30 minutes for extra peace of mind
DIFFERENT HEATING SETTINGS: Seamlessly adjust the temperature from 176 DegreeF up to 410 DegreeF to suit fine, normal, and even thick hair

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
